over^ start_ARG italic_Q end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ]
−η⋅𝔼d0,π1:h−1,ℙ1:h−1∗[DKL(πh(⋅|sh)||π^h(⋅|sh))]\displaystyle-\eta\cdot\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},\pi_{1:h-1},\mathbb{P}^{*}_{1:h-1}}% \left[D_{\mathrm{KL}}\left(\pi_{h}(\cdot|s_{h})||\hat{\pi}_{h}(\cdot|s_{h})% \right)\right]- italic_η ⋅ blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 : italic_h - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 : italic_h - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_KL end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) | | over^ start_ARG italic_π end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) ]
=𝔼d0,π1:h,ℙ1:h∗⁢[V^h+1⁢(sh+1)−Q^h⁢(sh,ah)]−𝔼d0,π^1:h,ℙ1:h∗⁢[V^h+1⁢(sh+1)−Q^h⁢(sh,ah)]absentsubscript𝔼subscript𝑑0subscript𝜋:1ℎsubscriptsuperscriptℙ:1ℎdelimited-[]subscript^𝑉ℎ1subscript𝑠ℎ1subscript^𝑄ℎsubscript𝑠ℎsubscript𝑎ℎsubscript𝔼subscript𝑑0subscript^𝜋:1ℎsubscriptsuperscriptℙ:1ℎdelimited-[]subscript^𝑉ℎ1subscript𝑠ℎ1subscript^𝑄ℎsubscript𝑠ℎsubscript𝑎ℎ\displaystyle=\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},\pi_{1:h},\mathbb{P}^{*}_{1:h}}\left[\hat{V}_{% h+1}(s_{h+1})-\hat{Q}_{h}(s_{h},a_{h})\right]-\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},\hat{\pi}_{1:h% },\mathbb{P}^{*}_{1:h}}\left[\hat{V}_{h+1}(s_{h+1})-\hat{Q}_{h}(s_{h},a_{h})\right]= blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 : italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 : italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ over^ start_ARG italic_V end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - over^ start_ARG italic_Q end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] - blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , over^ start_ARG italic_π end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 : italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 : italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ over^ start_ARG italic_V end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - over^ start_ARG italic_Q end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ]
−η⋅𝔼d0,π1:h−1,ℙ1:h−1∗[DKL(πh(⋅|sh)||π^h(⋅|sh))]\displaystyle-\eta\cdot\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},\pi_{1:h-1},\mathbb{P}^{*}_{1:h-1}}% \left[D_{\mathrm{KL}}\left(\pi_{h}(\cdot|s_{h})||\hat{\pi}_{h}(\cdot|s_{h})% \right)\right]- italic_η ⋅ blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 : italic_h - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 : italic_h - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_KL end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) | | over^ start_ARG italic_π end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) ]
+𝔼d0,π1:h,ℙ1:h∗⁢[Vh+1π⁢(sh+1)−V^h+1⁢(sh+1)]−𝔼d0,π1:h,ℙ1:h∗⁢[Vh+1π^⁢(sh+1)−V^h+1⁢(sh+1)].subscript𝔼subscript𝑑0subscript𝜋:1ℎsubscriptsuperscriptℙ:1ℎdelimited-[]subscriptsuperscript𝑉𝜋ℎ1subscript𝑠ℎ1subscript^𝑉ℎ1subscript𝑠ℎ1subscript𝔼subscript𝑑0subscript𝜋:1ℎsubscriptsuperscriptℙ:1ℎdelimited-[]subscriptsuperscript𝑉^𝜋ℎ1subscript𝑠ℎ1subscript^𝑉ℎ1subscript𝑠ℎ1\displaystyle+\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},\pi_{1:h},\mathbb{P}^{*}_{1:h}}\left[V^{\pi}_{% h+1}(s_{h+1})-\hat{V}_{h+1}(s_{h+1})\right]-\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},\pi_{1:h},% \mathbb{P}^{*}_{1:h}}\left[V^{\hat{\pi}}_{h+1}(s_{h+1})-\hat{V}_{h+1}(s_{h+1})% \right].+ blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 : italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 : italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ italic_V start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_π end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - over^ start_ARG italic_V end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] - blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 : italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 : italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ italic_V start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over^ start_ARG italic_π end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - over^ start_ARG italic_V end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] .

The proposition can be obtained by iteratively using the above relationship for h∈[H]ℎdelimited-[]𝐻h\in[H]italic_h ∈ [ italic_H ]. ∎

C.2 Proof of Theorem 1

First, with the assumption u∗∈𝒰superscript𝑢𝒰u^{*}\in\mathcal{U}italic_u start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∈ caligraphic_U and ℙ∗∈𝒫superscriptℙ𝒫\mathbb{P}^{*}\in\mathcal{P}blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∈ caligraphic_P, the following lemma demonstrates that 𝒰~tsubscript~𝒰𝑡\widetilde{\mathcal{U}}_{t}over~ start_ARG caligraphic_U end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and 𝒫~tsubscript~𝒫𝑡\widetilde{\mathcal{P}}_{t}over~ start_ARG caligraphic_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT are valid confidence sets.

Lemma 1 (Proposition B.1 from Liu et al. (2023a)).

There exists an absolute constant c1subscript𝑐1c_{1}italic_c start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT such that for any δ∈(0,1]𝛿01\delta\in(0,1]italic_δ ∈ ( 0 , 1 ], with probability at least 1−δ1𝛿1-\delta1 - italic_δ, for all t∈[T]𝑡delimited-[]𝑇t\in[T]italic_t ∈ [ italic_T ], u^∈𝒰^𝑢𝒰\hat{u}\in\mathcal{U}over^ start_ARG italic_u end_ARG ∈ caligraphic_U, and ℙ^∈𝒫^ℙ𝒫\hat{\mathbb{P}}\in\mathcal{P}over^ start_ARG blackboard_P end_ARG ∈ caligraphic_P, it holds that

Lt⁢(u^)−Lt⁢(u∗)≤c1⁢log⁡(|𝒰|⁢T/δ),Lt⁢(ℙ^)−Lt⁢(ℙ∗)≤c1⁢log⁡(|𝒫|⁢T/δ),formulae-sequencesubscript𝐿𝑡^𝑢subscript𝐿𝑡superscript𝑢subscript𝑐1𝒰𝑇𝛿subscript𝐿𝑡^ℙsubscript𝐿𝑡superscriptℙsubscript𝑐1𝒫𝑇𝛿\displaystyle L_{t}(\hat{u})-L_{t}(u^{*})\leq c_{1}\log(|\mathcal{U}|T/\delta)% ,\qquad L_{t}(\hat{\mathbb{P}})-L_{t}(\mathbb{P}^{*})\leq c_{1}\log(|\mathcal{% P}|T/\delta),italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG italic_u end_ARG ) - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_u start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ≤ italic_c start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_log ( | caligraphic_U | italic_T / italic_δ ) , italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG blackboard_P end_ARG ) - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ≤ italic_c start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_log ( | caligraphic_P | italic_T / italic_δ ) ,

which implies that u∗∈𝒰~tsuperscript𝑢subscript~𝒰𝑡u^{*}\in\widetilde{\mathcal{U}}_{t}italic_u start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∈ over~ start_ARG caligraphic_U end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and ℙ∗∈𝒫~tsuperscriptℙsubscript~𝒫𝑡\mathbb{P}^{*}\in\widetilde{\mathcal{P}}_{t}blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∈ over~ start_ARG caligraphic_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT.

Then, we provide an additional lemma demonstrating the in-sample error of the MLE and optimistic estimators.

Lemma 2.

There exists an absolute constant c2subscript𝑐2c_{2}italic_c start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT such that for any δ∈(0,1]𝛿01\delta\in(0,1]italic_δ ∈ ( 0 , 1 ], with probability at least 1−δ1𝛿1-\delta1 - italic_δ, for all t∈[T]𝑡delimited-[]𝑇t\in[T]italic_t ∈ [ italic_T ], we have

∑i<t|σ⁢(u^t⁢(si,H2,ai,H2)−u^t⁢(si,H1,ai,H1))−σ⁢(u∗⁢(si,H2,ai,H2)−u∗⁢(si,H1,ai,H1))|2≤c2⁢log⁡(|𝒰|⁢T/δ);subscript𝑖𝑡superscript𝜎subscript^𝑢𝑡subscriptsuperscript𝑠2𝑖𝐻subscriptsuperscript𝑎2𝑖𝐻subscript^𝑢𝑡subscriptsuperscript𝑠1𝑖𝐻subscriptsuperscript𝑎1𝑖𝐻𝜎superscript𝑢subscriptsuperscript𝑠2𝑖𝐻subscriptsuperscript𝑎2𝑖𝐻superscript𝑢subscriptsuperscript𝑠1𝑖𝐻subscriptsuperscript𝑎1𝑖𝐻2subscript𝑐2𝒰𝑇𝛿\displaystyle\sum_{i<t}\left|\sigma\left(\hat{u}_{t}(s^{2}_{i,H},a^{2}_{i,H})-% \hat{u}_{t}(s^{1}_{i,H},a^{1}_{i,H})\right)-\sigma\left(u^{*}(s^{2}_{i,H},a^{2% }_{i,H})-u^{*}(s^{1}_{i,H},a^{1}_{i,H})\right)\right|^{2}\leq c_{2}\log(|% \mathcal{U}|T/\delta);∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i < italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | italic_σ ( over^ start_ARG italic_u end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - over^ start_ARG italic_u end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) - italic_σ ( italic_u start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_u start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) | start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≤ italic_c start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_log ( | caligraphic_U | italic_T / italic_δ ) ;
∑i<t|σ⁢(u~t⁢(si,H2,ai,H2)−u~t⁢(si,H1,ai,H1))−σ⁢(u∗⁢(si,H2,ai,H2)−u∗⁢(si,H1,ai,H1))|2≤c2⁢log⁡(|𝒰|⁢T/δ),subscript𝑖𝑡superscript𝜎subscript~𝑢𝑡subscriptsuperscript𝑠2𝑖𝐻subscriptsuperscript𝑎2𝑖𝐻subscript~𝑢𝑡subscriptsuperscript𝑠1𝑖𝐻subscriptsuperscript𝑎1𝑖𝐻𝜎superscript𝑢subscriptsuperscript𝑠2𝑖𝐻subscriptsuperscript𝑎2𝑖𝐻superscript𝑢subscriptsuperscript𝑠1𝑖𝐻subscriptsuperscript𝑎1𝑖𝐻2subscript𝑐2𝒰𝑇𝛿\displaystyle\sum_{i<t}\left|\sigma\left(\widetilde{u}_{t}(s^{2}_{i,H},a^{2}_{% i,H})-\widetilde{u}_{t}(s^{1}_{i,H},a^{1}_{i,H})\right)-\sigma\left(u^{*}(s^{2% }_{i,H},a^{2}_{i,H})-u^{*}(s^{1}_{i,H},a^{1}_{i,H})\right)\right|^{2}\leq c_{2% }\log(|\mathcal{U}|T/\delta),∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i < italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | italic_σ ( over~ start_ARG italic_u end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - over~ start_ARG italic_u end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) - italic_σ ( italic_u start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_u start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) | start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≤ italic_c start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_log ( | caligraphic_U | italic_T / italic_δ ) ,

and for all t∈[T]𝑡delimited-[]𝑇t\in[T]italic_t ∈ [ italic_T ], h∈[H]ℎdelimited-[]𝐻h\in[H]italic_h ∈ [ italic_H ], we have

∑j∈{1,2}∑h∈[H]∑i<tTV⁢({d0,πij,[ℙ1:h−1∗,ℙ^t,h,ℙh+1:H∗]},{d0,πij,ℙ1:H∗})2≤c2⁢log⁡(|𝒫|⁢H⁢T/δ);subscript𝑗12subscriptℎdelimited-[]𝐻subscript𝑖𝑡TVsuperscriptsubscript𝑑0subscriptsuperscript𝜋𝑗𝑖subscriptsuperscriptℙ:1ℎ1subscript^ℙ𝑡ℎsubscriptsuperscriptℙ:ℎ1𝐻subscript𝑑0subscriptsuperscript𝜋𝑗𝑖subscriptsuperscriptℙ:1𝐻2subscript𝑐2𝒫𝐻𝑇𝛿\displaystyle\sum_{j\in\{1,2\}}\sum_{h\in[H]}\sum_{i<t}\mathrm{TV}\left(\{d_{0% },\pi^{j}_{i},[\mathbb{P}^{*}_{1:h-1},\hat{\mathbb{P}}_{t,h},\mathbb{P}^{*}_{h% +1:H}]\},\{d_{0},\pi^{j}_{i},\mathbb{P}^{*}_{1:H}\}\right)^{2}\leq c_{2}\log(|% \mathcal{P}|HT/\delta);∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j ∈ { 1 , 2 } end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h ∈ [ italic_H ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i < italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_TV ( { italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , [ blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 : italic_h - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , over^ start_ARG blackboard_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h + 1 : italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] } , { italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 : italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT } ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≤ italic_c start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_log ( | caligraphic_P | italic_H italic_T / italic_δ ) ;
∑j∈{1,2}∑h∈[H]∑i<tTV⁢({d0,πij,[ℙ1:h−1∗,ℙ~t,h,ℙh+1:H∗]},{d0,πij,ℙ1:H∗})2≤c2⁢log⁡(|𝒫|⁢H⁢T/δ),subscript𝑗12subscriptℎdelimited-[]𝐻subscript𝑖𝑡TVsuperscriptsubscript𝑑0subscriptsuperscript𝜋𝑗𝑖subscriptsuperscriptℙ:1ℎ1subscript~ℙ𝑡ℎsubscriptsuperscriptℙ:ℎ1𝐻subscript𝑑0subscriptsuperscript𝜋𝑗𝑖subscriptsuperscriptℙ:1𝐻2subscript𝑐2𝒫𝐻𝑇𝛿\displaystyle\sum_{j\in\{1,2\}}\sum_{h\in[H]}\sum_{i<t}\mathrm{TV}\left(\{d_{0% },\pi^{j}_{i},[\mathbb{P}^{*}_{1:h-1},\widetilde{\mathbb{P}}_{t,h},\mathbb{P}^% {*}_{h+1:H}]\},\{d_{0},\pi^{j}_{i},\mathbb{P}^{*}_{1:H}\}\right)^{2}\leq c_{2}% \log(|\mathcal{P}|HT/\delta),∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j ∈ { 1 , 2 } end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h ∈ [ italic_H ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i < italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_TV ( { italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , [ blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 : italic_h - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , over~ start_ARG blackboard_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h + 1 : italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] } , { italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 : italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT } ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≤ italic_c start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_log ( | caligraphic_P | italic_H italic_T / italic_δ ) ,

where TV⁢({d0,π,ℙ},{d0,π′,ℙ′})TVsubscript𝑑0𝜋ℙsubscript𝑑0superscript𝜋′superscriptℙ′\mathrm{TV}(\{d_{0},\pi,\mathbb{P}\},\{d_{0},\pi^{\prime},\mathbb{P}^{\prime}\})roman_TV ( { italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π , blackboard_P } , { italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT } ) denotes the TV distance between the probability distributions over the trajectories induced by d0,π,ℙsubscript𝑑0𝜋ℙd_{0},\pi,\mathbb{P}italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π , blackboard_P and d0,π′,ℙ′subscript𝑑0superscript𝜋′superscriptℙ′d_{0},\pi^{\prime},\mathbb{P}^{\prime}italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT.

Proof of Lemma 2.

First, for u~tsubscript~𝑢𝑡\widetilde{u}_{t}over~ start_ARG italic_u end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, we can obtain that with probability at least 1−δ1𝛿1-\delta1 - italic_δ, there exists an absolute constant c𝑐citalic_c such that for all t∈[T]𝑡delimited-[]𝑇t\in[T]italic_t ∈ [ italic_T ],

∑i<t|σ⁢(u~t⁢(si,H2,ai,H2)−u~t⁢(si,H1,ai,H1))−σ⁢(u∗⁢(si,H2,ai,H2)−u∗⁢(si,H1,ai,H1))|2subscript𝑖𝑡superscript𝜎subscript~𝑢𝑡subscriptsuperscript𝑠2𝑖𝐻subscriptsuperscript𝑎2𝑖𝐻subscript~𝑢𝑡subscriptsuperscript𝑠1𝑖𝐻subscriptsuperscript𝑎1𝑖𝐻𝜎superscript𝑢subscriptsuperscript𝑠2𝑖𝐻subscriptsuperscript𝑎2𝑖𝐻superscript𝑢subscriptsuperscript𝑠1𝑖𝐻subscriptsuperscript𝑎1𝑖𝐻2\displaystyle\sum_{i<t}\left|\sigma\left(\widetilde{u}_{t}(s^{2}_{i,H},a^{2}_{% i,H})-\widetilde{u}_{t}(s^{1}_{i,H},a^{1}_{i,H})\right)-\sigma\left(u^{*}(s^{2% }_{i,H},a^{2}_{i,H})-u^{*}(s^{1}_{i,H},a^{1}_{i,H})\right)\right|^{2}∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i < italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | italic_σ ( over~ start_ARG italic_u end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - over~ start_ARG italic_u end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) - italic_σ ( italic_u start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_u start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) | start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
≤c⁢(∑i<tlog⁡zi⋅σ⁢(u∗⁢(si,H1,ai,H1)−u∗⁢(si,H2,ai,H2))+(1−zi)⋅σ⁢(u∗⁢(si,H2,ai,H2)−u∗⁢(si,H1,ai,H1))zi⋅σ⁢(u~t⁢(si,H1,ai,H1)−u~t⁢(si,H2,ai,H2))+(1−zi)⋅σ⁢(u~t⁢(si,H2,ai,H2)−u~t⁢(si,H1,ai,H1))+log⁡(|𝒰|⁢T/δ))absent𝑐subscript𝑖𝑡⋅subscript𝑧𝑖𝜎superscript𝑢subscriptsuperscript𝑠1𝑖𝐻subscriptsuperscript𝑎1𝑖𝐻superscript𝑢subscriptsuperscript𝑠2𝑖𝐻subscriptsuperscript𝑎2𝑖𝐻⋅1subscript𝑧𝑖𝜎superscript𝑢subscriptsuperscript𝑠2𝑖𝐻subscriptsuperscript𝑎2𝑖𝐻superscript𝑢subscriptsuperscript𝑠1𝑖𝐻subscriptsuperscript𝑎1𝑖𝐻⋅subscript𝑧𝑖𝜎subscript~𝑢𝑡subscriptsuperscript𝑠1𝑖𝐻subscriptsuperscript𝑎1𝑖𝐻subscript~𝑢𝑡subscriptsuperscript𝑠2𝑖𝐻subscriptsuperscript𝑎2𝑖𝐻⋅1subscript𝑧𝑖𝜎subscript~𝑢𝑡subscriptsuperscript𝑠2𝑖𝐻subscriptsuperscript𝑎2𝑖𝐻subscript~𝑢𝑡subscriptsuperscript𝑠1𝑖𝐻subscriptsuperscript𝑎1𝑖𝐻𝒰𝑇𝛿\displaystyle\leq c\left(\sum_{i<t}\log\frac{z_{i}\cdot\sigma\left(u^{*}(s^{1}% _{i,H},a^{1}_{i,H})-u^{*}(s^{2}_{i,H},a^{2}_{i,H})\right)+(1-z_{i})\cdot\sigma% \left(u^{*}(s^{2}_{i,H},a^{2}_{i,H})-u^{*}(s^{1}_{i,H},a^{1}_{i,H})\right)}{z_% {i}\cdot\sigma\left(\widetilde{u}_{t}(s^{1}_{i,H},a^{1}_{i,H})-\widetilde{u}_{% t}(s^{2}_{i,H},a^{2}_{i,H})\right)+(1-z_{i})\cdot\sigma\left(\widetilde{u}_{t}% (s^{2}_{i,H},a^{2}_{i,H})-\widetilde{u}_{t}(s^{1}_{i,H},a^{1}_{i,H})\right)}+% \log(|\mathcal{U}|T/\delta)\right)≤ italic_c ( ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i < italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_log divide start_ARG italic_z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋅ italic_σ ( italic_u start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - over~ start_ARG italic_u end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) + ( 1 - italic_z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ⋅ italic_σ ( over~ start_ARG italic_u end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - =c⁢(Lt⁢(u∗)−Lt⁢(u~t)+log⁡(|𝒰|⁢T/δ))absent𝑐subscript𝐿𝑡superscript𝑢subscript𝐿𝑡subscript~𝑢𝑡𝒰𝑇𝛿\displaystyle=c\left(L_{t}(u^{*})-L_{t}(\widetilde{u}_{t})+\log(|\mathcal{U}|T% /\delta)\right)= italic_c ( italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_u start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( over~ start_ARG italic_u end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + roman_log ( | caligraphic_U | italic_T / italic_δ ) )
≤c⁢(Lt⁢(u∗)−Lt⁢(u^t)+c1⁢log⁡(|𝒰|⁢T/δ)+log⁡(|𝒰|⁢T/δ))absent𝑐subscript𝐿𝑡superscript𝑢subscript𝐿𝑡subscript^𝑢𝑡subscript𝑐1𝒰𝑇𝛿𝒰𝑇𝛿\displaystyle\leq c\left(L_{t}(u^{*})-L_{t}(\hat{u}_{t})+c_{1}\log(|\mathcal{U% }|T/\delta)+\log(|\mathcal{U}|T/\delta)\right)≤ italic_c ( italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_u start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG italic_u end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + italic_c start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_log ( | caligraphic_U | italic_T / italic_δ ) + roman_log ( | caligraphic_U | italic_T / italic_δ ) )
≤c2⁢log⁡(|𝒰|⁢T/δ).absentsubscript𝑐2𝒰𝑇𝛿\displaystyle\leq c_{2}\log(|\mathcal{U}|T/\delta).≤ italic_c start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_log ( | caligraphic_U | italic_T / italic_δ ) .

where the first inequality is from Proposition B.2 from Liu et al. (2023a) and the second inequality uses Lemma 1. The result for u^tsubscript^𝑢𝑡\hat{u}_{t}over^ start_ARG italic_u end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT can be similarly established.

Then, following similar steps, for ℙ~tsubscript~ℙ𝑡\widetilde{\mathbb{P}}_{t}over~ start_ARG blackboard_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, we can obtain that with probability at least 1−δ1𝛿1-\delta1 - italic_δ, there exists an absolute constant c𝑐citalic_c such that for all t∈[T]𝑡delimited-[]𝑇t\in[T]italic_t ∈ [ italic_T ],

∑j∈{1,2}∑h∈[H]∑i<tTV⁢({d0,πij,[ℙ1:h−1∗,ℙ~t,h,ℙh+1:H∗]},{d0,πij,ℙ1:H∗})2subscript𝑗12subscriptℎdelimited-[]𝐻subscript𝑖𝑡TVsuperscriptsubscript𝑑0subscriptsuperscript𝜋𝑗𝑖subscriptsuperscriptℙ:1ℎ1subscript~ℙ𝑡ℎsubscriptsuperscriptℙ:ℎ1𝐻subscript𝑑0subscriptsuperscript𝜋𝑗𝑖subscriptsuperscriptℙ:1𝐻2\displaystyle\sum_{j\in\{1,2\}}\sum_{h\in[H]}\sum_{i<t}\mathrm{TV}\left(\{d_{0% },\pi^{j}_{i},[\mathbb{P}^{*}_{1:h-1},\widetilde{\mathbb{P}}_{t,h},\mathbb{P}^% {*}_{h+1:H}]\},\{d_{0},\pi^{j}_{i},\mathbb{P}^{*}_{1:H}\}\right)^{2}∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j ∈ { 1 , 2 } end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h ∈ [ italic_H ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i < italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_TV ( { italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , [ blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 : italic_h - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , over~ start_ARG blackboard_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h + 1 : italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] } , { italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 : italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT } ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
≤∑j∈{1,2}∑h∈[H]c⋅(∑i<tlog⁡ℙh∗⁢(si,h+1j|si,hj,ai,hj)ℙ~t,h⁢(si,h+1j|si,hj,ai,hj)+log⁡(|𝒫h|⁢H⁢T/δ))absentsubscript𝑗12subscriptℎdelimited-[]𝐻⋅𝑐subscript𝑖𝑡subscriptsuperscriptℙℎconditionalsubscriptsuperscript𝑠𝑗𝑖ℎ1subscriptsuperscript𝑠𝑗𝑖ℎsubscriptsuperscript𝑎𝑗𝑖ℎsubscript~ℙ𝑡ℎconditionalsubscriptsuperscript𝑠𝑗𝑖ℎ1subscriptsuperscript𝑠𝑗𝑖ℎsubscriptsuperscript𝑎𝑗𝑖ℎsubscript𝒫ℎ𝐻𝑇𝛿\displaystyle\leq\sum_{j\in\{1,2\}}\sum_{h\in[H]}c\cdot\left(\sum_{i<t}\log% \frac{\mathbb{P}^{*}_{h}(s^{j}_{i,h+1}|s^{j}_{i,h},a^{j}_{i,h})}{\widetilde{% \mathbb{P}}_{t,h}(s^{j}_{i,h+1}|s^{j}_{i,h},a^{j}_{i,h})}+\log(|\mathcal{P}_{h% }|HT/\delta)\right)≤ ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j ∈ { 1 , 2 } end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h ∈ [ italic_H ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_c ⋅ ( ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i < italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_log divide start_ARG blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG over~ start_ARG blackboard_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG + roman_log ( | caligraphic_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | italic_H italic_T / italic_δ ) )
=c⋅(∑j∈{1,2}∑i<tlog⁡ℙ∗,πij⁢(τij)ℙ~tπij⁢(τij)+2⁢log⁡(|𝒫|⁢H⁢T/δ))absent⋅𝑐subscript𝑗12subscript𝑖𝑡superscriptℙsubscriptsuperscript𝜋𝑗𝑖subscriptsuperscript𝜏𝑗𝑖subscriptsuperscript~ℙsubscriptsuperscript𝜋𝑗𝑖𝑡subscriptsuperscript𝜏𝑗𝑖2𝒫𝐻𝑇𝛿\displaystyle=c\cdot\left(\sum_{j\in\{1,2\}}\sum_{i<t}\log\frac{\mathbb{P}^{*,% \pi^{j}_{i}}(\tau^{j}_{i})}{\widetilde{\mathbb{P}}^{\pi^{j}_{i}}_{t}(\tau^{j}_% {i})}+2\log(|\mathcal{P}|HT/\delta)\right)= italic_c ⋅ ( ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j ∈ { 1 , 2 } end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i < italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_log divide start_ARG blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_τ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG over~ start_ARG blackboard_P end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_τ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG + 2 roman_log ( | caligraphic_P | italic_H italic_T / italic_δ ) )
=c⋅(Lt⁢(ℙ∗)−Lt⁢(ℙ~t)+2⁢log⁡(|𝒫|⁢H⁢T/δ))absent⋅𝑐subscript𝐿𝑡superscriptℙsubscript𝐿𝑡subscript~ℙ𝑡2𝒫𝐻𝑇𝛿\displaystyle=c\cdot\left(L_{t}(\mathbb{P}^{*})-L_{t}(\widetilde{\mathbb{P}}_{% t})+2\log(|\mathcal{P}|HT/\delta)\right)= italic_c ⋅ ( italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( over~ start_ARG blackboard_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + 2 roman_log ( | caligraphic_P | italic_H italic_T / italic_δ ) )
≤c⋅(Lt⁢(ℙ∗)−Lt⁢(ℙ^t)+c1⁢log⁡(|𝒫|⁢T/δ)+2⁢log⁡(|𝒫|⁢H⁢T/δ))absent⋅𝑐subscript𝐿𝑡superscriptℙsubscript𝐿𝑡subscript^ℙ𝑡subscript𝑐1𝒫𝑇𝛿2𝒫𝐻𝑇𝛿\displaystyle\leq c\cdot\left(L_{t}(\mathbb{P}^{*})-L_{t}(\hat{\mathbb{P}}_{t}% )+c_{1}\log(|\mathcal{P}|T/\delta)+2\log(|\mathcal{P}|HT/\delta)\right)≤ italic_c ⋅ ( italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG blackboard_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + italic_c start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_log ( | caligraphic_P | italic_T / italic_δ ) + 2 roman_log ( | caligraphic_P | italic_H italic_T / italic_δ ) )
≤c2⁢log⁡(|𝒫|⁢H⁢T/δ).absentsubscript𝑐2𝒫𝐻𝑇𝛿\displaystyle\leq c_{2}\log(|\mathcal{P}|HT/\delta).≤ italic_c start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_log ( | caligraphic_P | italic_H italic_T / italic_δ ) .

The result for ℙ^tsubscript^ℙ𝑡\hat{\mathbb{P}}_{t}over^ start_ARG blackboard_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT can also be similarly established. ∎

Proof of Theorem 1.

In the following proofs, we omit the KL term in the decomposition to ease the presentation. Then, with probability at least 1−δ1𝛿1-\delta1 - italic_δ, for all t∈[T]𝑡delimited-[]𝑇t\in[T]italic_t ∈ [ italic_T ], we can obtain that

J⁢(π∗)−J⁢(πt1)𝐽superscript𝜋𝐽subscriptsuperscript𝜋1𝑡\displaystyle J(\pi^{*})-J(\pi^{1}_{t})italic_J ( italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - italic_J ( italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT )
=𝔼d0,π∗,ℙ∗⁢[u∗⁢(sH,aH)]−𝔼d0,πt1,ℙ∗⁢[u∗⁢(sH,aH)]−(𝔼d0,π∗,ℙ∗⁢[u^t⁢(sH,aH)]−𝔼d0,πt1,ℙ∗⁢[u^t⁢(sH,aH)])absentsubscript𝔼subscript𝑑0superscript𝜋superscriptℙdelimited-[]superscript𝑢subscript𝑠𝐻subscript𝑎𝐻subscript𝔼subscript𝑑0subscriptsuperscript𝜋1𝑡superscriptℙdelimited-[]superscript𝑢subscript𝑠𝐻subscript𝑎𝐻subscript𝔼subscript𝑑0superscript𝜋superscriptℙdelimited-[]subscript^𝑢𝑡subscript𝑠𝐻subscript𝑎𝐻subscript𝔼subscript𝑑0subscriptsuperscript𝜋1𝑡superscriptℙdelimited-[]subscript^𝑢𝑡subscript𝑠𝐻subscript𝑎𝐻\displaystyle=\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},\pi^{*},\mathbb{P}^{*}}\left[u^{*}(s_{H},a_{H}% )\right]-\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},\pi^{1}_{t},\mathbb{P}^{*}}\left[u^{*}(s_{H},a_{H})% \right]-\left(\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},\pi^{*},\mathbb{P}^{*}}\left[\hat{u}_{t}(s_{H}% ,a_{H})\right]-\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},\pi^{1}_{t},\mathbb{P}^{*}}\left[\hat{u}_{t}(% s_{H},a_{H})\right]\right)= blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ italic_u start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] - blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ italic_u start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] - ( blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ over^ start_ARG italic_u end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] - +∑h∈[H]𝔼d0,πt2,ℙ~t⁢[V^t,h+1⁢(sh+1)−[ℙ^t,h⁢V^t,h+1]⁢(sh,ah)]+∑h∈[H]𝔼d0,πt1,ℙ∗⁢[[ℙ^t,h⁢V^t,h+1]⁢(sh,ah)−V^t,h+1⁢(sh+1)]⏟term (II)t,subscript⏟subscriptℎdelimited-[]𝐻subscript𝔼subscript𝑑0superscriptsubscript𝜋𝑡2subscript~ℙ𝑡delimited-[]subscript^𝑉𝑡ℎ1subscript𝑠ℎ1delimited-[]subscript^ℙ𝑡ℎsubscript^𝑉𝑡ℎ1subscript𝑠ℎsubscript𝑎ℎsubscriptℎdelimited-[]𝐻subscript𝔼subscript𝑑0subscriptsuperscript𝜋1𝑡superscriptℙdelimited-[]delimited-[]subscript^ℙ𝑡ℎsubscript^𝑉𝑡ℎ1subscript𝑠ℎsubscript𝑎ℎsubscript^𝑉𝑡ℎ1subscript𝑠ℎ1subscriptterm (II)𝑡\displaystyle+\underbrace{\sum_{h\in[H]}\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},\pi_{t}^{2},% \widetilde{\mathbb{P}}_{t}}\left[\hat{V}_{t,h+1}(s_{h+1})-\left[\hat{\mathbb{P% }}_{t,h}\hat{V}_{t,h+1}\right](s_{h},a_{h})\right]+\sum_{h\in[H]}\mathbb{E}_{d% _{0},\pi^{1}_{t},\mathbb{P}^{*}}\left[\left[\hat{\mathbb{P}}_{t,h}\hat{V}_{t,h% +1}\right](s_{h},a_{h})-\hat{V}_{t,h+1}(s_{h+1})\right]}_{\text{term (II)}_{t}},+ under⏟ start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h ∈ [ italic_H ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , over~ start_ARG blackboard_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ over^ start_ARG italic_V end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - where the inequality is from the definition of πt2subscriptsuperscript𝜋2𝑡\pi^{2}_{t}italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and the fact that (u∗,ℙ∗)∈𝒰~t×𝒫~tsuperscript𝑢superscriptℙsubscript~𝒰𝑡subscript~𝒫𝑡(u^{*},\mathbb{P}^{*})\in\widetilde{\mathcal{U}}_{t}\times\widetilde{\mathcal{% P}}_{t}( italic_u start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ∈ over~ start_ARG caligraphic_U end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT × over~ start_ARG caligraphic_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT from Lemma 1.

We define the following terms:

term (D)tsubscriptterm (D)𝑡\displaystyle\text{term (D)}_{t}term (D) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT :=∑j∈{1,2}∑h∈[H]𝔼d0,πtj,ℙ∗[TV(ℙ^t,h(⋅|sh,ah),ℙh∗(⋅|sh,ah))].\displaystyle:=\sum_{j\in\{1,2\}}\sum_{h\in[H]}\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},\pi^{j}_{t},% \mathbb{P}^{*}}\left[\mathrm{TV}\left(\hat{\mathbb{P}}_{t,h}(\cdot|s_{h},a_{h}% ),\mathbb{P}^{*}_{h}(\cdot|s_{h},a_{h})\right)\right].:= ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j ∈ { 1 , 2 } end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h ∈ [ italic_H ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ roman_TV ( over^ start_ARG blackboard_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) ] .

For term (I)tsubscriptterm (I)𝑡\text{term (I)}_{t}term (I) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, we have that

term (I)tsubscriptterm (I)𝑡\displaystyle\text{term (I)}_{t}term (I) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT :=𝔼d0,πt2,ℙ~t⁢[u~t⁢(sH,aH)]−𝔼d0,πt1,ℙ~t⁢[u~t⁢(sH,aH)]−(𝔼d0,πt2,ℙ~t⁢[u^t⁢(sH,aH)]−𝔼d0,πt1,ℙ~t⁢[u^t⁢(sH,aH)])assignabsentsubscript𝔼subscript𝑑0superscriptsubscript𝜋𝑡2subscript~ℙ𝑡delimited-[]subscript~𝑢𝑡subscript𝑠𝐻subscript𝑎𝐻subscript𝔼subscript𝑑0subscriptsuperscript𝜋1𝑡subscript~ℙ𝑡delimited-[]subscript~𝑢𝑡subscript𝑠𝐻subscript𝑎𝐻subscript𝔼subscript𝑑0superscriptsubscript𝜋𝑡2subscript~ℙ𝑡delimited-[]subscript^𝑢𝑡subscript𝑠𝐻subscript𝑎𝐻subscript𝔼subscript𝑑0subscriptsuperscript𝜋1𝑡subscript~ℙ𝑡delimited-[]subscript^𝑢𝑡subscript𝑠𝐻subscript𝑎𝐻\displaystyle:=\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},\pi_{t}^{2},\widetilde{\mathbb{P}}_{t}}\left[% \widetilde{u}_{t}(s_{H},a_{H})\right]-\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},\pi^{1}_{t},\widetilde% {\mathbb{P}}_{t}}\left[\widetilde{u}_{t}(s_{H},a_{H})\right]-\left(\mathbb{E}_% {d_{0},\pi_{t}^{2},\widetilde{\mathbb{P}}_{t}}\left[\hat{u}_{t}(s_{H},a_{H})% \right]-\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},\pi^{1}_{t},\widetilde{\mathbb{P}}_{t}}\left[\hat{u}% _{t}(s_{H},a_{H})\right]\right):= blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , over~ start_ARG blackboard_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ over~ start_ARG italic_u end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] - +𝔼d0,πt2,ℙ∗⁢[ut∗⁢(sH,aH)]−𝔼d0,πt1,ℙ∗⁢[ut∗⁢(sH,aH)]−(𝔼d0,πt2,ℙ∗⁢[u^t⁢(sH,aH)]−𝔼d0,πt1,ℙ∗⁢[u^t⁢(sH,aH)])⏟term (B)tsubscript⏟subscript𝔼subscript𝑑0superscriptsubscript𝜋𝑡2superscriptℙdelimited-[]subscriptsuperscript𝑢𝑡subscript𝑠𝐻subscript𝑎𝐻subscript𝔼subscript𝑑0superscriptsubscript𝜋𝑡1superscriptℙdelimited-[]subscriptsuperscript𝑢𝑡subscript𝑠𝐻subscript𝑎𝐻subscript𝔼subscript𝑑0superscriptsubscript𝜋𝑡2superscriptℙdelimited-[]subscript^𝑢𝑡subscript𝑠𝐻subscript𝑎𝐻subscript𝔼subscript𝑑0subscriptsuperscript𝜋1𝑡superscriptℙdelimited-[]subscript^𝑢𝑡subscript𝑠𝐻subscript𝑎𝐻subscriptterm (B)𝑡\displaystyle+\underbrace{\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},\pi_{t}^{2},\mathbb{P}^{*}}\left[u% ^{*}_{t}(s_{H},a_{H})\right]-\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},\pi_{t}^{1},\mathbb{P}^{*}}% \left[u^{*}_{t}(s_{H},a_{H})\right]-\left(\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},\pi_{t}^{2},% \mathbb{P}^{*}}\left[\hat{u}_{t}(s_{H},a_{H})\right]-\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},\pi^{1}% _{t},\mathbb{P}^{*}}\left[\hat{u}_{t}(s_{H},a_{H})\right]\right)}_{\text{term % (B)}_{t}}+ under⏟ start_ARG blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ italic_u start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] - +4⁢B⋅∑j∈{1,2}∑h∈[H]𝔼d0𝔼πtj,ℙ∗[TV(ℙ~t,h(⋅|sh,ah),ℙh∗(⋅|sh,ah))]⏟term (C)t.\displaystyle+4B\cdot\underbrace{\sum_{j\in\{1,2\}}\sum_{h\in[H]}\mathbb{E}_{d% _{0}}\mathbb{E}_{\pi^{j}_{t},\mathbb{P}^{*}}\left[\mathrm{TV}\left(\widetilde{% \mathbb{P}}_{t,h}(\cdot|s_{h},a_{h}),\mathbb{P}^{*}_{h}(\cdot|s_{h},a_{h})% \right)\right]}_{\text{term (C)}_{t}}.+ 4 italic_B ⋅ under⏟ start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j ∈ { 1 , 2 } end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h ∈ [ italic_H ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ roman_TV ( over~ start_ARG blackboard_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) ] end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT term (C) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

For term (II)tsubscriptterm (II)𝑡\text{term (II)}_{t}term (II) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, we have that

term (II)tsubscriptterm (II)𝑡\displaystyle\text{term (II)}_{t}term (II) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =∑h∈[H]𝔼d0,πt2,ℙ~t⁢[V^t,h+1⁢(sh+1)−[ℙ^t,h⁢V^t,h+1]⁢(sh,ah)]absentsubscriptℎdelimited-[]𝐻subscript𝔼subscript𝑑0superscriptsubscript𝜋𝑡2subscript~ℙ𝑡delimited-[]subscript^𝑉𝑡ℎ1subscript𝑠ℎ1delimited-[]subscript^ℙ𝑡ℎsubscript^𝑉𝑡ℎ1subscript𝑠ℎsubscript𝑎ℎ\displaystyle=\sum_{h\in[H]}\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},\pi_{t}^{2},\widetilde{\mathbb{P% }}_{t}}\left[\hat{V}_{t,h+1}(s_{h+1})-\left[\hat{\mathbb{P}}_{t,h}\hat{V}_{t,h% +1}\right](s_{h},a_{h})\right]= ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h ∈ [ italic_H ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , over~ start_ARG blackboard_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ over^ start_ARG italic_V end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - [ over^ start_ARG blackboard_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG italic_V end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ]
+∑h∈[H]𝔼d0,πt1,ℙ∗⁢[[ℙ^t,h⁢V^t,h+1]⁢(sh,ah)−V^t,h+1⁢(sh+1)]subscriptℎdelimited-[]𝐻subscript𝔼subscript𝑑0subscriptsuperscript𝜋1𝑡superscriptℙdelimited-[]delimited-[]subscript^ℙ𝑡ℎsubscript^𝑉𝑡ℎ1subscript𝑠ℎsubscript𝑎ℎsubscript^𝑉𝑡ℎ1subscript𝑠ℎ1\displaystyle+\sum_{h\in[H]}\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},\pi^{1}_{t},\mathbb{P}^{*}}\left% [\left[\hat{\mathbb{P}}_{t,h}\hat{V}_{t,h+1}\right](s_{h},a_{h})-\hat{V}_{t,h+% 1}(s_{h+1})\right]+ ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h ∈ [ italic_H ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ [ over^ start_ARG blackboard_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG italic_V end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - over^ start_ARG italic_V end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ]
=∑h∈[H]𝔼d0,πt2,ℙ∗⁢[V^t,h+1⁢(sh+1)−[ℙ^t,h⁢V^t,h+1]⁢(sh,ah)]absentsubscriptℎdelimited-[]𝐻subscript𝔼subscript𝑑0superscriptsubscript𝜋𝑡2superscriptℙdelimited-[]subscript^𝑉𝑡ℎ1subscript𝑠ℎ1delimited-[]subscript^ℙ𝑡ℎsubscript^𝑉𝑡ℎ1subscript𝑠ℎsubscript𝑎ℎ\displaystyle=\sum_{h\in[H]}\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},\pi_{t}^{2},\mathbb{P}^{*}}\left% [\hat{V}_{t,h+1}(s_{h+1})-\left[\hat{\mathbb{P}}_{t,h}\hat{V}_{t,h+1}\right](s% _{h},a_{h})\right]= ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h ∈ [ italic_H ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ over^ start_ARG italic_V end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - [ over^ start_ARG blackboard_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG italic_V end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ]

−∑h∈[H]𝔼d0,πt2,ℙ∗⁢[V^t,h+1⁢(sh+1)−[ℙ^t,h⁢V^t,h+1]⁢(sh,ah)]subscriptℎdelimited-[]𝐻subscript𝔼subscript𝑑0superscriptsubscript𝜋𝑡2superscriptℙdelimited-[]subscript^𝑉𝑡ℎ1subscript𝑠ℎ1delimited-[]subscript^ℙ𝑡ℎsubscript^𝑉𝑡ℎ1subscript𝑠ℎsubscript𝑎ℎ\displaystyle-\sum_{h\in[H]}\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},\pi_{t}^{2},\mathbb{P}^{*}}\left% [\hat{V}_{t,h+1}(s_{h+1})-\left[\hat{\mathbb{P}}_{t,h}\hat{V}_{t,h+1}\right](s% _{h},a_{h})\right]- ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h ∈ [ italic_H ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ over^ start_ARG italic_V end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - [ over^ start_ARG blackboard_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG italic_V end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ]
+∑h∈[H]𝔼d0,πt1,ℙ∗⁢[[ℙ^t,h⁢V^t,h+1]⁢(sh,ah)−V^t,h+1⁢(sh+1)]subscriptℎdelimited-[]𝐻subscript𝔼subscript𝑑0subscriptsuperscript𝜋1𝑡superscriptℙdelimited-[]delimited-[]subscript^ℙ𝑡ℎsubscript^𝑉𝑡ℎ1subscript𝑠ℎsubscript𝑎ℎsubscript^𝑉𝑡ℎ1subscript𝑠ℎ1\displaystyle+\sum_{h\in[H]}\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},\pi^{1}_{t},\mathbb{P}^{*}}\left% [\left[\hat{\mathbb{P}}_{t,h}\hat{V}_{t,h+1}\right](s_{h},a_{h})-\hat{V}_{t,h+% 1}(s_{h+1})\right]+ ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h ∈ [ italic_H ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ [ over^ start_ARG blackboard_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG italic_V end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - over^ start_ARG italic_V end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ]
≤2B⋅∑j∈{1,2}∑h∈[H]𝔼d0,πtj,ℙ∗[TV(ℙ^t,h(⋅|sh,ah)),ℙh∗(⋅|sh,ah)]\displaystyle\leq 2B\cdot\sum_{j\in\{1,2\}}\sum_{h\in[H]}\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},\pi% _{t}^{j},\mathbb{P}^{*}}\left[\mathrm{TV}(\hat{\mathbb{P}}_{t,h}(\cdot|s_{h},a% _{h})),\mathbb{P}^{*}_{h}(\cdot|s_{h},a_{h})\right]≤ 2 italic_B ⋅ ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j ∈ { 1 , 2 } end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h ∈ [ italic_H ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ roman_TV ( over^ start_ARG blackboard_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ]
+2⁢B⁢H⋅TV⁢({d0,πt2,ℙ~t},{d0,πt2,ℙ∗})⋅2𝐵𝐻TVsubscript𝑑0superscriptsubscript𝜋𝑡2subscript~ℙ𝑡subscript𝑑0superscriptsubscript𝜋𝑡2superscriptℙ\displaystyle+2BH\cdot\mathrm{TV}(\{d_{0},\pi_{t}^{2},\widetilde{\mathbb{P}}_{% t}\},\{d_{0},\pi_{t}^{2},\mathbb{P}^{*}\})+ 2 italic_B italic_H ⋅ roman_TV ( { italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , over~ start_ARG blackboard_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT } , { italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT } )

+2⁢B⁢H⋅∑j∈{1,2}∑h∈[H]𝔼d0,πtj,ℙ∗[TV(ℙ~t,h(⋅|sh,ah)),ℙh∗(⋅|sh,ah)]⏟term (C)t.\displaystyle+2BH\cdot\underbrace{\sum_{j\in\{1,2\}}\sum_{h\in[H]}\mathbb{E}_{% d_{0},\pi_{t}^{j},\mathbb{P}^{*}}\left[\mathrm{TV}(\widetilde{\mathbb{P}}_{t,h% }(\cdot|s_{h},a_{h})),\mathbb{P}^{*}_{h}(\cdot|s_{h},a_{h})\right]}_{\text{% term (C)}_{t}}.+ 2 italic_B italic_H ⋅ under⏟ start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j ∈ { 1 , 2 } end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h ∈ [ italic_H ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ roman_TV ( over~ start_ARG blackboard_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT term (C) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

In the above derivations, we have repeatedly used similar relationships as follows:

TV({d0,πt2,ℙ~t},{d0,πt2,ℙ∗})≤∑h∈[H]𝔼d0,πt2,ℙ∗[TV(ℙ~t,h(⋅|sh,ah),ℙh∗(⋅|sh,ah))],\displaystyle\mathrm{TV}(\{d_{0},\pi^{2}_{t},\widetilde{\mathbb{P}}_{t}\},\{d_% {0},\pi^{2}_{t},\mathbb{P}^{*}\})\leq\sum_{h\in[H]}\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},\pi^{2}_{% t},\mathbb{P}^{*}}\left[\mathrm{TV}\left(\widetilde{\mathbb{P}}_{t,h}(\cdot|s_% {h},a_{h}),\mathbb{P}^{*}_{h}(\cdot|s_{h},a_{h})\right)\right],roman_TV ( { italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , over~ start_ARG blackboard_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT } , { italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT } ) ≤ ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h ∈ [ italic_H ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ roman_TV ( over~ start_ARG blackboard_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) ] ,

which can be derived as

TV⁢({d0,πt2,ℙ~t},{d0,πt2,ℙ∗})TVsubscript𝑑0subscriptsuperscript𝜋2𝑡subscript~ℙ𝑡subscript𝑑0subscriptsuperscript𝜋2𝑡superscriptℙ\displaystyle\mathrm{TV}(\{d_{0},\pi^{2}_{t},\widetilde{\mathbb{P}}_{t}\},\{d_% {0},\pi^{2}_{t},\mathbb{P}^{*}\})roman_TV ( { italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , over~ start_ARG blackboard_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT } , { italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT } ) ≤∑h∈[H]TV⁢({d0,πt2,ℙ1:h−1∗,ℙ~t,h:H},{d0,πt2,ℙ1:h∗,ℙ~t,h+1:H})absentsubscriptℎdelimited-[]𝐻TVsubscript𝑑0subscriptsuperscript𝜋2𝑡subscriptsuperscriptℙ:1ℎ1subscript~ℙ:𝑡ℎ𝐻subscript𝑑0subscriptsuperscript𝜋2𝑡subscriptsuperscriptℙ:1ℎsubscript~ℙ:𝑡ℎ1𝐻\displaystyle\leq\sum_{h\in[H]}\mathrm{TV}\left(\{d_{0},\pi^{2}_{t},\mathbb{P}% ^{*}_{1:h-1},\widetilde{\mathbb{P}}_{t,h:H}\},\{d_{0},\pi^{2}_{t},\mathbb{P}^{% *}_{1:h},\widetilde{\mathbb{P}}_{t,h+1:H}\}\right)≤ ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h ∈ [ italic_H ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_TV ( { italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 : italic_h - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , over~ start_ARG blackboard_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h : italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT } , { italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 : italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , over~ start_ARG blackboard_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h + 1 : italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT } )
=∑h∈[H]𝔼d0,πt2,ℙ∗[TV(ℙ~t,h(⋅|sh,ah),ℙh∗(⋅|sh,ah)})].\displaystyle=\sum_{h\in[H]}\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},\pi^{2}_{t},\mathbb{P}^{*}}\left% [\mathrm{TV}\left(\widetilde{\mathbb{P}}_{t,h}(\cdot|s_{h},a_{h}),\mathbb{P}^{% *}_{h}(\cdot|s_{h},a_{h})\}\right)\right].= ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h ∈ [ italic_H ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ roman_TV ( over~ start_ARG blackboard_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) } ) ] .

Then, we can obtain that

∑t∈[T]J⁢(π∗)−J⁢(π^t1)subscript𝑡delimited-[]𝑇𝐽superscript𝜋𝐽subscriptsuperscript^𝜋1𝑡\displaystyle\sum_{t\in[T]}J(\pi^{*})-J(\hat{\pi}^{1}_{t})∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ [ italic_T ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_J ( italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - italic_J ( over^ start_ARG italic_π end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ≤∑t∈[T]term (A)t+∑t∈[T]term (B)t+(4⁢B+2⁢B⁢H)⁢∑t∈[T]term (C)t+2⁢B⁢∑t∈[T]term (D)t.absentsubscript𝑡delimited-[]𝑇subscriptterm (A)𝑡subscript𝑡delimited-[]𝑇subscriptterm (B)𝑡4𝐵2𝐵𝐻subscript𝑡delimited-[]𝑇subscriptterm (C)𝑡2𝐵subscript𝑡delimited-[]𝑇subscriptterm (D)𝑡\displaystyle\leq\sum_{t\in[T]}\text{term (A)}_{t}+\sum_{t\in[T]}\text{term (B% )}_{t}+(4B+2BH)\sum_{t\in[T]}\text{term (C)}_{t}+2B\sum_{t\in[T]}\text{term (D% )}_{t}.≤ ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ [ italic_T ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT term (A) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ [ italic_T ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT term (B) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + ( 4 italic_B + 2 italic_B italic_H ) ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ [ italic_T ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT term (C) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 2 italic_B ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ [ italic_T ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT term (D) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

Then, we control the sum of each individual term in the following. First, for term (A)tsubscriptterm (A)𝑡\text{term (A)}_{t}term (A) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, with probability at least 1−δ1𝛿1-\delta1 - italic_δ, we have that

∑t∈[T]term (A)tsubscript𝑡delimited-[]𝑇subscriptterm (A)𝑡\displaystyle\sum_{t\in[T]}\text{term (A)}_{t}∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ [ italic_T ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT term (A) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
=∑t∈[T]𝔼d0,πt2,ℙ∗⁢[u~t⁢(sH,aH)]−𝔼d0,πt1,ℙ∗⁢[u~t⁢(sH,aH)]−(𝔼d0,πt2,ℙ∗⁢[u∗⁢(sH,aH)]−𝔼d0,πt1,ℙ∗⁢[u∗⁢(sH,aH)])absentsubscript𝑡delimited-[]𝑇subscript𝔼subscript𝑑0superscriptsubscript𝜋𝑡2superscriptℙdelimited-[]subscript~𝑢𝑡subscript𝑠𝐻subscript𝑎𝐻subscript𝔼subscript𝑑0subscriptsuperscript𝜋1𝑡superscriptℙdelimited-[]subscript~𝑢𝑡subscript𝑠𝐻subscript𝑎𝐻subscript𝔼subscript𝑑0superscriptsubscript𝜋𝑡2superscriptℙdelimited-[]superscript𝑢subscript𝑠𝐻subscript𝑎𝐻subscript𝔼subscript𝑑0subscriptsuperscript𝜋1𝑡superscriptℙdelimited-[]superscript𝑢subscript𝑠𝐻subscript𝑎𝐻\displaystyle=\sum_{t\in[T]}\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},\pi_{t}^{2},\mathbb{P}^{*}}\left% [\widetilde{u}_{t}(s_{H},a_{H})\right]-\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},\pi^{1}_{t},\mathbb{P% }^{*}}\left[\widetilde{u}_{t}(s_{H},a_{H})\right]-\left(\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},\pi_% {t}^{2},\mathbb{P}^{*}}\left[u^{*}(s_{H},a_{H})\right]-\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},\pi^{% 1}_{t},\mathbb{P}^{*}}\left[u^{*}(s_{H},a_{H})\right]\right)= ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ [ italic_T ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ over~ start_ARG italic_u end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] - blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ over~ start_ARG italic_u end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] - ( blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ italic_u start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] - blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ italic_u start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] )
≤∑t∈[T]u~t⁢(st,H2,at,H2)−u~t⁢(st,H1,at,H1)−(u∗⁢(st,H2,at,H2)−u∗⁢(st,H1,at,H1))+O⁢(B⁢T⁢log⁡(1/δ))absentsubscript𝑡delimited-[]𝑇subscript~𝑢𝑡subscriptsuperscript𝑠2𝑡𝐻subscriptsuperscript𝑎2𝑡𝐻subscript~𝑢𝑡subscriptsuperscript𝑠1𝑡𝐻subscriptsuperscript𝑎1𝑡𝐻superscript𝑢subscriptsuperscript𝑠2𝑡𝐻subscriptsuperscript𝑎2𝑡𝐻superscript𝑢subscriptsuperscript𝑠1𝑡𝐻subscriptsuperscript𝑎1𝑡𝐻𝑂𝐵𝑇1𝛿\displaystyle\leq\sum_{t\in[T]}\widetilde{u}_{t}(s^{2}_{t,H},a^{2}_{t,H})-% \widetilde{u}_{t}(s^{1}_{t,H},a^{1}_{t,H})-\left(u^{*}(s^{2}_{t,H},a^{2}_{t,H}% )-u^{*}(s^{1}_{t,H},a^{1}_{t,H})\right)+O(B\sqrt{T\log(1/\delta)})≤ ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ [ italic_T ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT over~ start_ARG italic_u end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - over~ start_ARG italic_u end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - ( italic_u start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_u start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) + italic_O ( italic_B square-root start_ARG italic_T roman_log ( 1 / italic_δ ) end_ARG )
≤d𝒰⁢∑t=2T(1+∑i=1t−1(u~t⁢(si,H2,ai,H2)−u~t⁢(si,H1,ai,H1)−(u∗⁢(si,H2,ai,H2)−u∗⁢(si,H1,ai,H1)))2)+O⁢(B⁢T⁢log⁡(1/δ))absentsubscript𝑑𝒰superscriptsubscript𝑡2𝑇1superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑡1superscriptsubscript~𝑢𝑡subscriptsuperscript𝑠2𝑖𝐻subscriptsuperscript𝑎2𝑖𝐻subscript~𝑢𝑡subscriptsuperscript𝑠1𝑖𝐻subscriptsuperscript𝑎1𝑖𝐻superscript𝑢subscriptsuperscript𝑠2𝑖𝐻subscriptsuperscript𝑎2𝑖𝐻superscript𝑢subscriptsuperscript𝑠1𝑖𝐻subscriptsuperscript𝑎1𝑖𝐻2𝑂𝐵𝑇1𝛿\displaystyle\leq\sqrt{d_{\mathcal{U}}\sum_{t=2}^{T}\left(1+\sum_{i=1}^{t-1}% \left(\widetilde{u}_{t}(s^{2}_{i,H},a^{2}_{i,H})-\widetilde{u}_{t}(s^{1}_{i,H}% ,a^{1}_{i,H})-\left(u^{*}(s^{2}_{i,H},a^{2}_{i,H})-u^{*}(s^{1}_{i,H},a^{1}_{i,% H})\right)\right)^{2}\right)}+O(B\sqrt{T\log(1/\delta)})≤ square-root start_ARG italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT caligraphic_U end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_t - ≲κ−1⁢B⁢d𝒰⁢T⁢log⁡(|𝒰|⁢T/δ),less-than-or-similar-toabsentsuperscript𝜅1𝐵subscript𝑑𝒰𝑇𝒰𝑇𝛿\displaystyle\lesssim\kappa^{-1}B\sqrt{d_{\mathcal{U}}T\log(|\mathcal{U}|T/% \delta)},≲ italic_κ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B square-root start_ARG italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT caligraphic_U end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T roman_log ( | caligraphic_U | italic_T / italic_δ ) end_ARG ,

where the first inequality is from the Hoeffding inequality, the second inequality uses the Eluder coefficient d𝒰:=EC⁢(1,𝒰−𝒰,T)assignsubscript𝑑𝒰EC1𝒰𝒰𝑇d_{\mathcal{U}}:=\texttt{EC}(1,\mathcal{U}-\mathcal{U},T)italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT caligraphic_U end_POSTSUBSCRIPT := EC ( 1 , caligraphic_U - caligraphic_U , italic_T ) from Definition 4, the third inequality leverages the mean value theorem with κ:=1/(2+exp⁡(−B)+exp⁡(B))assign𝜅12𝐵𝐵\kappa:=1/(2+\exp(-B)+\exp(B))italic_κ := 1 / ( 2 + roman_exp ( - italic_B ) + roman_exp ( italic_B ) ) representing the minimum derivative of σ⁢(⋅)𝜎⋅\sigma(\cdot)italic_σ ( ⋅ ) in the regime of [0,B]0𝐵[0,B][ 0 , italic_B ], and the last inequality incorporates Lemma 2. A similar result can be obtained for term (B)tsubscriptterm (B)𝑡\text{term (B)}_{t}term (B) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT.

For term (C)tsubscriptterm (C)𝑡\text{term (C)}_{t}term (C) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, we have that

∑t∈[T]term (C)tsubscript𝑡delimited-[]𝑇subscriptterm (C)𝑡\displaystyle\sum_{t\in[T]}\text{term (C)}_{t}∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ [ italic_T ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT term (C) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =∑j∈{1,2}∑t∈[T]∑h∈[H]𝔼d0,πtj,ℙ∗[TV(ℙ~t,h(⋅|sh,ah),ℙh∗(⋅|sh,ah))]\displaystyle=\sum_{j\in\{1,2\}}\sum_{t\in[T]}\sum_{h\in[H]}\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},% \pi^{j}_{t},\mathbb{P}^{*}}\left[\mathrm{TV}\left(\widetilde{\mathbb{P}}_{t,h}% (\cdot|s_{h},a_{h}),\mathbb{P}^{*}_{h}(\cdot|s_{h},a_{h})\right)\right]= ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j ∈ { 1 , 2 } end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ [ italic_T ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h ∈ [ italic_H ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ roman_TV ( over~ start_ARG blackboard_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) ]
=∑j∈{1,2}∑t∈[T]∑h∈[H]TV⁢({d0,πtj,[ℙ1:h−1∗,ℙ~t,h,ℙh+1:H∗]},{d0,πtj,ℙ1:H∗})absentsubscript𝑗12subscript𝑡delimited-[]𝑇subscriptℎdelimited-[]𝐻TVsubscript𝑑0subscriptsuperscript𝜋𝑗𝑡subscriptsuperscriptℙ:1ℎ1subscript~ℙ𝑡ℎsubscriptsuperscriptℙ:ℎ1𝐻subscript𝑑0subscriptsuperscript𝜋𝑗𝑡subscriptsuperscriptℙ:1𝐻\displaystyle=\sum_{j\in\{1,2\}}\sum_{t\in[T]}\sum_{h\in[H]}\mathrm{TV}\left(% \{d_{0},\pi^{j}_{t},[\mathbb{P}^{*}_{1:h-1},\widetilde{\mathbb{P}}_{t,h},% \mathbb{P}^{*}_{h+1:H}]\},\{d_{0},\pi^{j}_{t},\mathbb{P}^{*}_{1:H}\}\right)= ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j ∈ { 1 , 2 } end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ [ italic_T ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h ∈ [ italic_H ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_TV ( { italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , [ blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 : italic_h - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , over~ start_ARG blackboard_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h + 1 : italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] } , { italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 : italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT } )
≤2⁢H⋅ξ⁢(d𝒫,T,c2⁢log⁡(|𝒫|⁢H⁢T/δ)),absent⋅2𝐻𝜉subscript𝑑𝒫𝑇subscript𝑐2𝒫𝐻𝑇𝛿\displaystyle\leq 2H\cdot\xi(d_{\mathcal{P}},T,c_{2}\log(|\mathcal{P}|HT/% \delta)),≤ 2 italic_H ⋅ italic_ξ ( italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT caligraphic_P end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_T , italic_c start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_log ( | caligraphic_P | italic_H italic_T / italic_δ ) ) ,

where the last step is from the generalized Eluder-type condition in Definition 5 and Lemma 2. A similar result can be obtained for term (D)tsubscriptterm (D)𝑡\text{term (D)}_{t}term (D) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT.

Finally, we obtain that

Reg⁢(T)≲less-than-or-similar-toReg𝑇absent\displaystyle\text{Reg}(T)\lesssimReg ( italic_T ) ≲ κ−1Bd𝒰⁢T⁢log⁡(|𝒰|⁢T/δ)+B2Hξ(d𝒫,T,c2log(|𝒫|HT/δ)\displaystyle\kappa^{-1}B\sqrt{d_{\mathcal{U}}T\log(|\mathcal{U}|T/\delta)}+B^% {2}H\xi(d_{\mathcal{P}},T,c_{2}\log(|\mathcal{P}|HT/\delta)italic_κ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B square-root start_ARG italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT caligraphic_U end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T roman_log ( | caligraphic_U | italic_T / italic_δ ) end_ARG + italic_B start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_H italic_ξ ( italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT caligraphic_P end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_T , italic_c start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_log ( | caligraphic_P | italic_H italic_T / italic_δ )
−η⋅∑h∈[H]𝔼d0,π∗,ℙ∗[DKL(πh∗(⋅|sh),πt,h1(⋅|sh))],\displaystyle-\eta\cdot\sum_{h\in[H]}\mathbb{E}_{d_{0},\pi^{*},\mathbb{P}^{*}}% \left[D_{\mathrm{KL}}(\pi^{*}_{h}(\cdot|s_{h}),\pi^{1}_{t,h}(\cdot|s_{h}))% \right],- italic_η ⋅ ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h ∈ [ italic_H ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_KL end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) ] ,

which concludes the proof. ∎

Appendix D Technical Lemmas

Lemma 3 (Solution of KL-regularized Optimization (Proposition 7.16 and Theorem 15.3 of Zhang (2023))).

Given a loss functional with respect to p(⋅|x)p(\cdot|x)italic_p ( ⋅ | italic_x ), written as

𝔼w∼p⁢(⋅)⁢[−U⁢(w)+η⁢DKL⁢(p⁢(⋅),p0⁢(⋅))]=η⁢DKL⁢(p⁢(⋅),p0⁢(⋅)⁢exp⁡(1η⁢U⁢(⋅)))−η⋅log⁡𝔼w∼p0⁢(⋅)⁢exp⁡(1η⁢U⁢(w))⏟Cr,subscript𝔼similar-to𝑤𝑝⋅delimited-[]𝑈𝑤𝜂subscript𝐷KL𝑝⋅subscript𝑝0⋅𝜂subscript𝐷KL𝑝⋅subscript𝑝0⋅1𝜂𝑈⋅⋅𝜂subscript⏟subscript𝔼similar-to𝑤subscript𝑝0⋅1𝜂𝑈𝑤subscript𝐶𝑟\mathbb{E}_{w\sim p(\cdot)}\Big{[}-U(w)+\eta D_{\mathrm{KL}}\big{(}p(\cdot),p_% {0}(\cdot)\big{)}\Big{]}=\eta D_{\mathrm{KL}}\Big{(}p(\cdot),p_{0}(\cdot)\exp% \Big{(}\frac{1}{\eta}U(\cdot)\Big{)}\Big{)}-\eta\cdot\log\underbrace{\mathbb{E% }_{w\sim p_{0}(\cdot)}\exp\big{(}\frac{1}{\eta}U(w)\big{)}}_{C_{r}},blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_w ∼ italic_p ( ⋅ ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ - italic_U ( italic_w ) + italic_η italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_KL end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_p ( ⋅ ) , italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ⋅ ) ) ] = italic_η italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_KL end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_p ( ⋅ ) , italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ⋅ ) roman_exp ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_η end_ARG italic_U ( ⋅ ) ) ) - italic_η ⋅ roman_log under⏟ start_ARG blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_w ∼ italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ⋅ ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_exp ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_η end_ARG italic_U ( italic_w ) ) end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_r end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ,

where the minimizer of the loss functional is p∗⁢(w)=1Cr⁢p0⁢(w)⁢exp⁡(1η⁢U⁢(w))superscript𝑝𝑤1subscript𝐶𝑟subscript𝑝0𝑤1𝜂𝑈𝑤p^{*}(w)=\frac{1}{C_{r}}p_{0}(w)\exp\Big{(}\frac{1}{\eta}U(w)\Big{)}italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_w ) = divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_r end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_w ) roman_exp ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_η end_ARG italic_U ( italic_w ) ), also known as Gibbs distribution.

Definition 4 (Eluder Coefficient, Definition 17.17 in Zhang (2023)).

Given a function class ℱℱ\mathcal{F}caligraphic_F, its Eluder coefficient EC⁢(λ,ℱ,T)EC𝜆ℱ𝑇\texttt{EC}(\lambda,\mathcal{F},T)EC ( italic_λ , caligraphic_F , italic_T ) is defined as the smallest number d𝑑ditalic_d so that for any sequence {xt:t∈[T]}conditional-setsubscript𝑥𝑡𝑡delimited-[]𝑇\{x_{t}:t\in[T]\}{ italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_t ∈ [ italic_T ] } and {ft:t∈[T]}∈ℱconditional-setsubscript𝑓𝑡𝑡delimited-[]𝑇ℱ\{f_{t}:t\in[T]\}\in\mathcal{F}{ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_t ∈ [ italic_T ] } ∈ caligraphic_F,

∑t=2T|ft⁢(xt)−f∗⁢(xt)|≤d⁢∑t=2T(λ+∑i=1t−1(ft⁢(xi)−f∗⁢(xi))2).superscriptsubscript𝑡2𝑇subscript𝑓𝑡subscript𝑥𝑡superscript𝑓subscript𝑥𝑡𝑑superscriptsubscript𝑡2𝑇𝜆superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑡1superscriptsubscript𝑓𝑡subscript𝑥𝑖superscript𝑓subscript𝑥𝑖2\displaystyle\sum_{t=2}^{T}|f_{t}(x_{t})-f^{*}(x_{t})|\leq\sqrt{d\sum_{t=2}^{T% }\left(\lambda+\sum_{i=1}^{t-1}(f_{t}(x_{i})-f^{*}(x_{i}))^{2}\right)}.∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) | ≤ square-root start_ARG italic_d ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_λ + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG .
Definition 5 (Generalized Eluder-type Condition, Condition 3.1 in Liu et al. (2023a)).

There exists a real number d𝒫∈ℝ+subscript𝑑𝒫superscriptℝd_{\mathcal{P}}\in\mathbb{R}^{+}italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT caligraphic_P end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∈ blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT and a function ξ𝜉\xiitalic_ξ such that for any (T,Δ)∈ℕ×ℝ+𝑇Δℕsuperscriptℝ(T,\Delta)\in\mathbb{N}\times\mathbb{R}^{+}( italic_T , roman_Δ ) ∈ blackboard_N × blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, transitions {ℙt′:t∈[T]}conditional-setsubscriptsuperscriptℙ′𝑡𝑡delimited-[]𝑇\{\mathbb{P}^{\prime}_{t}:t\in[T]\}{ blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_t ∈ [ italic_T ] } and policies {πt:t∈[T]}conditional-setsubscript𝜋𝑡𝑡delimited-[]𝑇\{\pi_{t}:t\in[T]\}{ italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_t ∈ [ italic_T ] }, we have

∀t∈[T],∑i<tTV({d0,ℙi′,πi},{d0,ℙ,πi})2≤Δ⇒∑t∈[T]TV({d0,ℙt′,πt},{d0,ℙ,πt})≤ξ(d𝒫,T,Δ).\displaystyle\forall t\in[T],\quad\sum_{i<t}\mathrm{TV}(\{d_{0},\mathbb{P}^{% \prime}_{i},\pi_{i}\},\{d_{0},\mathbb{P},\pi_{i}\})^{2}\leq\Delta\quad% \Rightarrow\sum_{t\in[T]}\mathrm{TV}(\{d_{0},\mathbb{P}^{\prime}_{t},\pi_{t}\}% ,\{d_{0},\mathbb{P},\pi_{t}\})\leq\xi(d_{\mathcal{P}},T,\Delta).∀ italic_t ∈ [ italic_T ] , ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i < italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_TV ( { italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT } , { italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P , italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT } ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≤ roman_Δ ⇒ ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ [ italic_T ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_TV ( { italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT } , { italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P , italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT } ) ≤ italic_ξ ( italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT caligraphic_P end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_T , roman_Δ ) .
